allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(im-server): Add JWT token validation for WebSocket authentication

- Add JJWT dependency for JWT parsing
- Create JwtTokenValidator service with same secret as API server
- Update MessageProcessor LOGIN handler to validate JWT tokens
- Verify deviceId matches between token and request
- Return proper error messages for invalid/expired tokens

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /home/msi_lumikra/projects/lumi-chat commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(web\): Add demo accounts and fix conversation list preview

- Add demo accounts \(alice@demo.com, bob@demo.com\) with SQL seed file
- Display demo credentials on login page with click-to-fill
- Fix sender''s conversation list not showing sent message immediately
  - Update conv.lastMessage and conv.lastMsgTime in sendMessage action

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/msi_lumikra/projects/lumi-chat commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add 4 remaining features from RainbowChat-Web UI reference

Phase 1: Quick Reply Templates
- Add QuickReply entity, repository, service, and controller \(backend\)
- Add V10__add_quick_replies.sql migration
- Create QuickReplyPanel.vue for chat input toolbar
- Create QuickReplySettings.vue for managing templates in Settings
- Add quickReply.ts API client and Pinia store

Phase 2: Voice Recording
- Create VoiceRecorder.vue with MediaRecorder API support
- Add audioVisualizer.ts for real-time waveform display
- Add audioConverter.ts for audio format utilities
- Integrate into ChatConversation.vue toolbar

Phase 3: Photo Album Panel
- Create PhotoAlbumPanel.vue with tabs for images/videos/files
- Add getMediaMessages endpoint to MessageController
- Add media filter query to MessageRepository
- Integrate into ChatConversation.vue info panel

Phase 4: Voice Introduction
- Add voice_intro_url and voice_intro_duration columns to users
- Add V11__add_voice_introduction.sql migration
- Add uploadVoice method to FileStorageService with audio validation
- Create VoiceIntroduction.vue component
- Integrate into UserProfileDialog.vue

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

- Update AddFriendDialog tests with createAxiosError helper
- Update Login and Register tests to use Error instances

- Add conversation API mock to websocket tests
- Improve Leaflet mock for LocationPicker tests

Achieved 858/859 tests passing \(99.9% pass rate\)

- Add DEVELOPMENT_PLAN.md with feature completion status
- Document Phase A \(Stabilization\), B \(Enhancement\), C \(Production\)
- Track all 47/47 RainbowChat-Web features as complete

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/msi_lumikra/projects/lumi-chat commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(web\): Add keyboard shortcuts for faster navigation

- Create useKeyboardShortcuts composable with global keyboard handler
- Add KeyboardShortcutsHelp dialog component \(Ctrl+/\)
- Shortcuts: Ctrl+1/2/3 \(nav\), Ctrl+, \(settings\), Ctrl+Shift+D \(dark mode\)
- Alt+Up/Down to navigate conversations, Ctrl+F to focus search
- Persist enabled state in localStorage
- Show shortcuts list in Settings > Appearance tab
- Fix Leaflet mock in LocationPicker tests

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
